item.title: Chapter_8_Elite_Advances
item.description: Chapter 8: Elite Advances So many people simply buy the items they need at the price they are given.

item.title: Chapter_1_Getting_Started
item.description: Overview This chapter introduces players to the core mechanics of UESRPG 3e, outlines the dice system, and explains how to interpret rolls and difficulty levels.

item.title: Appendix
item.description: Appendix Spell MakinG referenCe The reference materials in this section are for players to use to create their own spells.

item.description: Chapter 7: Economics & Equipment So many people simply buy the items they need at the price they are given.

item.title: Chapter_6_Magic
item.description: Chapter 6: Magic The Charm is intensified by the energy you bring to it, by your own skills, just as all spells are.

item.title: Chapter_5_Advanced_Mechanics
item.description: Chapter 5: Advanced Mechanics We dont have shields in our culture. It seems strange to my boy, I imagine.

item.title: Chapter_4_Talents_&_Traits
item.description: Chapter 4: Talents & Traits Like a sudden, violent snow squall that rends travelers blind and threatens to tear loose the very foundations of the sturdiest hall, the Snow Prince did sweep into our numbers.

item.title: Chapter_3_Skills
item.description: Chapter 3: Skills To achieve true mastery, you must understand what it is youre doing.

item.title: Chapter_2_Character_Creation
item.description: Chapter 2: Character Creation Ah yes, weve been expecting you! Youll have to be recorded before youre officially released.
